articles.author: Sean Cudahy
articles.title: American Airlines and DFW announce huge expansion at America's second-busiest airport - The Points Guy
articles.description: American Airlines and Dallas Fort Worth International Airport (DFW) are planning an expansive new terminal at the Texas hub.
articles.content:
American Airlines is planning major growth at its biggest hub.
The airline and Dallas Fort Worth International Airport (DFW) on Thursday announced revamped plans for a new $4 billion terminal that w… [+3671 chars]
